> I.e.: You enter '5/11/01', and the UI will in turn display 
> 'May 11, 2001' as a feedback to you.

Nice solution, indeed.  My question is: what tests will you write for this
feature?  And in the particular aspect of negative testing (the subject of the
thread), would you test for empty date, null date, wrong date...  Would you
write a JUnit test for each of these cases or assume that if the 'positive'
tests work, your code is fine?

-Vladimir
